column11: Review Text
Thanks for this good experience. This is our first time. We are very happy about everything. The food is good too. And thanks so much too all the lifeguards to take care about us. Thanks !

We visited Pearl Bay on the 10th of August as a group of 15 people. Our tickets had been purchased in advance. However, upon arrival, we realized that the tickets had been left behind. We approached the supervisor and explained the situation, but the lady supervisor was unwilling to listen. She repeatedly stated that we would not be allowed entry and instructed us to go home and bring the tickets if we wished to enter the premises. We requested that she escalate the matter if she was not in a position to make a decision, but she refused, saying she could neither escalate the issue nor provide the manager‚Äôs contact number. After several requests, we managed to get the manager on the line, though he was not on duty at the time. I explained the situation and asked him to verify our ticket purchases from the back end and make an exception. He insisted that he needed to see the original tickets before allowing entry. Fortunately, since we were from Colombo, we were able to return home, retrieve the tickets, and return to the park. After a long discussion, we were finally allowed in, but the incident had already spoiled the mood and the day. If we had been from outside Colombo, it would have been impossible to return the same day. It is a shame for such a lovely place. The management clearly needs proper training in handling customer inconveniences. The most disappointing part was that they never allowed us to fully explain our situation, repeatedly speaking over us. At one point, they even stated, ‚ÄúWe are David Peiris,‚Äù as though the brand name alone justified their actions. Such an approach will only diminish the brand‚Äôs value over time. Once we entered, the park itself offered a pleasant atmosphere, friendly staff, great service, fantastic food, and excellent facilities. Unfortunately, these positives are overshadowed by poor management practices, which risk spoiling an otherwise wonderful experience.
Had an amazing experience at the Pearl Bay Water Park. A mini version of Sunway Lagoon in Malaysia. Staff is so friendly and kind. Value for money.

We had a wonderful experience visiting Pearl Bay Water Park ‚Äî the attractions were fun, and the overall atmosphere was excellent. However, we believe the food options could be improved. Currently, there is only one restaurant available, and it limits the dining experience. Adding more variety and dining spots would greatly enhance the overall enjoyment for visitors. Looking forward to visiting soon again üòÄ.
Nice water park. The slides were amazing. The canteen in Pearl Bay was good. The location was okay. Good theme park especially for Sri Lanka. Very Nice theme park good to go againüòÄ

It was an amazing place. The whole themed water park is well maintained and there is a person, who is always cleaning the locker rooms that helps people with the designated lockers. My vehicle got stuck at the park and the security helped me to get the lorry to come to the correct place to pick up the car. Even the maintain staff helped me to direct the lorry driver to the place. All the staff are very helpful and it is great to have a place like this, with such amazing service.
It was amazing day. Maintainence is very good and staff also very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend this place to everyone. Thank you.
The best water park in srilanka Maintained so well and staff are excellent Always attentive and helpful The water quality is top notch

column8: Fun filled day with lot of adventures...
column11: We went on a public holiday, and it was crowded by 10 am. Place is well organized and clean. Has ample parking spaces, ticketing has a que, but they efficiently clear it. Outside food, drink (even water) is not allowed. Drinking water is freely available. Changing rooms and wash rooms are clean n doesn't get crowded. Can have a locker to keep the valiables/belongings for LKR 700. Kids (height less than 120 cm) can only access Rookie Bay n Kids pool. Lifeguards on duty are professional and watchful, to maintain the discipline.The rides have ques, still quite enjoyable. Overall it was a good experience.

column8: fantastic experience is perlbay Sri Lanka best waterpark
column11: Wooow . I think I I have a good experience today because Sri Lanka best waterpark in this Pearl Bay I would like to invite all the people and come and enjoy this place because it‚Äôs very very very very enjoyable and very happiness games have there then you can select what games and you can enjoy this very fantastic. come, your family solo couples I think couples is best gains have in bay. Then I would invite all the happiness people.

It was a super experience. Went here to celebrate my son's birthday, from the moment they knew it the staff really went out of their way to make him feel special.  Need to mention Gayani who really greeted us courteously and looked into every detail.  Suddenly the whole staff surrounded my son and sang happy birthday- making it extra memorable. The facilities are excellent in keeping with international standards. Cleanliness is next level and it's a super location for a family get away. Thank you to Gayani, Pehesara and the entire team for making us feel at home.

We had a fantastic family outing at Pearl Bay, Bandaragama, which was recommended to us by Nalin Piyathilaka. As it was a Saturday, the venue was lively and bustling, which added to the energetic atmosphere. The reception staff were exceptionally friendly, with Marlon, in particular, going out of his way to assist us. The environment, including the public area and washrooms, was well-maintained, clean, and pleasant. It's evident that the management takes health and safety seriously, ensuring the well-being of their guests. However, I would like to share one piece of feedback. I was informed by the reception staff that I could top up and utilize services directly. During lunch, after waiting in line to place my order, I was told by the cashier that I did not have sufficient credit. This situation required me to return to the locker room to retrieve my wallet, rejoin the queue, and place the same order again, which was a bit disappointing. Aside from this minor inconvenience, everything else was fantastic.

We recently visited Pearl Bay in Bandaragama and had an incredible experience. The place is beautifully designed with a serene atmosphere that‚Äôs perfect for a day out with family or friends. The water activities were a highlight‚Äîexciting yet safe, with well-maintained facilities and professional staff. The food at the on-site restaurant was delicious, offering a good variety of local and international dishes. The staff were friendly, attentive, and always ready to assist, which added to the overall positive experience. The park is clean and well-organized, with clear signage and plenty of shaded areas to relax. It‚Äôs an ideal destination for both thrill-seekers and those looking to unwind by the water. I highly recommend visiting Pearl Bay if you're in the area! Special Thank you goes out to Dinusha as well. Well done.

Great day out with lots of activities to please all ages. Waterpark is well set out with brilliant clean changing facilities and washrooms. The staff were all very helpful and friendly. We will definitely be back

Whilst on holiday in Sri Lanka, we wanted to visit one of the waterparks, so choose Pearl Bay and got a taxi from our resort to the park. Unfortunately, we did not have a great experience. It started off badly, when we got to gate to give our bags to be x-rayed and to be told we were not allowed to bring any bottles of drinking water into the park and that we had to purchase these inside, which was extremely annoying and very expensive to buy only the  small bottles of water available and having to ditch our water we had brought with us. When we got to the counter to pay for the tickets, there were 4 staff behind the counter but only one actually taking payments. There was 1 group in front of us, but after being ignored and about 6 other families being served before us, After 20 minutes we got out tickets, to be then informed that as tourists we were paying 20% more than anyone who had local ID or a bank card, with this price of ¬£16 each were pretty comparable to UK park prices. On arrival into the park my daughter then entered the kids splash area to be told she was not allowed in that zone as she did not have the correct wristband on, but to our knowledge we had purchased all-area tickets. The rides themselves were good, but at this point we had a sour taste in our mouth and very poor customer service. I really got the impression that the park is no t at all geared towards international visitors or thier expectations, which I felt was also echoed by the fact we were the only western guests in the park the whole day. I would recommend you try a different waterpark, as I really wished we did.

We had a wonderful time at Pearl Bay. Great water slide selection for anyone over 1.2m and a fantastic kids pool with slides and fun games for the little ones. Food was delicious too! Highly recommended if you want a day at a water park and you‚Äôre staying near Colombo!

I went to Pearl Bay today June 4 2024 around 11.40AM In the entrance there were very welcoming staff, who gave us a good overview, and also showed us several discounts Then, we first had some meals in the restaurant inside,and it was a decent restaurant. The wash rooms were very clean, and very well maintained with very new equipment We explored the water area, which has 10-15 different sports. All equipment were very well maintained, and in very good quality The support staff was very good, extremely helpful and always available. The playing areas and the rest of the places were extremely clean. I recommend this place 100% to anyone who is looking to spend a nice day out.

A wonderful place to visit & have fun with family. Had a great time. This was our 2nd visit & for sure will visit again and again. Very friendly and wonderful service given by all staff members and a special thank you to Mr.Pehesara & Ms.Nimesha for all the support and help given from the very beginning.
Had an awesome day there. The water slides were so much fun and there were almost no waiting times for the slides. The staff is super friendly and loves to help you.

I visited on 22/03/202 to Pearl bay  for my  1st time.‚ô•Ô∏èü´∂. Staff members are very welcoming, supportive & helpful from the time I entered, while I‚Äôm choosing the package & till we exit from there each & everyone was helpful & supportive. It‚Äôs really worth the price & really good place to experience the water games. Surely will be visiting again & again.‚ô•Ô∏èü•Çü´∞

Nice welcome by one the team members. Polite and friendly staff. Reasonably priced lockers and clean changing rooms. Suggest to add some solo tubes as well. Some activities are only for doubles. And food in the resturant  near the exit is not that good.
Great serviceüòÅ Very friendly üòÅ (Target bay) Pehesara and Nimesha gave a great service for all of usüòâ THANKYOU VERY MUCHü•Ç

A must visit place. We had a great time enjoying all the rides.The place is well maintained with all the facilities upto international standards.With life guards and security staff all around the park. The staff is very professional and friendly. Special thanks to staff member Pehesara at the entrance counter .Very friendly and helpful from the very first time we visited the venue. Always with a big smile welcoming guests.

An unparalleled experience awaits at this venue! The variety of slides is impressive, with "Loophole" and "Great Escape" standing out as our favorites. For those looking for a more relaxed pace, there's a serene pool for leisurely swimming. Adjacent to the pool, the restaurant offers convenient dining with the e-wallet feature on your wristband, ensuring seamless transactions for your meals. I must mention that the food was delectable. The facility ensures convenience and privacy with separate changing rooms for males and females, as well as private washrooms. There's also the option to rent a locker, all controlled by the wristband ticket. A highlight was the exemplary customer service. Samith at Target Bay truly went above and beyond, and the entire team was affable and accommodating. For adrenaline junkies, the "Speedbay" karting circuit is a must-try. As first-time karters, we appreciated the supportive and informative crew guiding us. In summary, whether you're in for exhilarating fun or a day of relaxation, this place has it all. I'll certainly be back and recommend it wholeheartedly!

Our experience was amazing! The Guest service staff was incredibly friendly, and the expert guiding team enhanced every event. Kids can enjoy tailored activities, while adults can dive into thrilling options like karting and water sports. The iconic karting and water activities stand out. The venue's cool ambiance makes it a fantastic choice for a day with family and friends.
we were 2 parents and two kids. the staff seemed to do everything in its power that we will not enjoy our stay. it costs a lot but you get very little in return

The experience we had was awesome.The staff was super friendly and the guiding team is well trained to support on each event.Kids can enjoy with their own activities and adults can join the thrillers.Karting and water activities are iconic events here and the environments is super cool to spend the day with family and friends.

Splash Bay we enjoyed alot in August during our kids school Vacation. Everything was perfect except the food. Food in the restaurant was too expensive and you will not getting lot of customers and we can't recommend to come their as when we enter and change to swim wear we cannot leave to buy food and the park doesn't allow food inside the premises. A small suggestion whether to allow food and water or maintain a restaurant with enough food and for reasonable prices.

On August 11, 2023, we visited Pearl Bay for the first time. The park was opened on time. Every employee was incredibly polite and attentive. The first activity we did was karting. We purchased a package for Rs. 7,800 that included SplashBay, SpeedBay, ArrowBay, and TargetBay. As my first experience at SpeedBay racing track, it was incredibly enjoyable and spectacular. Before attempting it, pay close attention to their directions. SplashBay, it was super thrilling specially that great escape ü§≠I tried umpteen times. This was a first gravity drop slide in SL. Really enjoyed all the water rides. Next TargetBay, the best place to check your vision üòÉ. Specially, we should mention Mr. Pehesara from TargetBay. He was very welcoming and very helpful. He explained well all the safety precautions and shooting techniques. The ArrowBay female employee was pleasant and amazing. She was incredibly helpful, but I forgot to ask her name. TBH, I am not happy with Yumbay's services. We ordered pasta and Mongolian rice. The pasta was hot and tasty, but the rice was too cold and not fresh which was Rs. 1,200/- All equipments modern and well maintained amusement park üëç Based on my experience, I can rate the zones as follows: *SpeedBay 4.5/5 *SplashBay 4.5/5 *TargetBay 4/5 *ArrowBay 4/5 *YumBay 2/5 It was literally nice spot to hang out with friends, family, and coworkers, as well as to plan birthday celebrations, sporting events, and business gatherings. Thank you üòä Pearl Bay. Will meet again soon üîú. I have already recommended it to some of my friends and colleagues. You can also see Pearl Bat reviewed vdos on my YouTube channel SAKTHI TALKS üòä. Highly recommend üëç

Literally the best place to visit in SriLanka‚ù§Ô∏èüá±üá∞ The people who work there are super awesome and friendly‚úÖ Food is amazying and tasty‚úÖ Customer service‚úÖ Mr. Pehesara did a great welcoming and it was a good first impression too‚úÖ Water rides/Archery /Shooting / karting was well organized‚úÖ  It was a great experience ‚ù§Ô∏è Thankyou Pearlbay‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Will meet again soonü•Ç Highly Recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è‚úÖ

We went to Target Bay, and we were helped by a member of staff called Pehesara. He was wonderful and helped me and my family and taught us to shoot. He was very nice and compassionate and we would highly recommend this place.

I am writing to formally report an appalling incident that transpired during our recent visit to PearlBay Amusement Park. My family, consisting of nine individuals, including a disabled member, was subjected to distressing harassment by two employees named Kapila. This incident is beyond unacceptable. Throughout our time at the park, the Kapila employees displayed shocking behavior, using offensive language and an alarming attitude. Their inhumane treatment towards our disabled family member and the entire group is utterly distressing. We were treated as less than human, akin to animals. We have attached video evidence that clearly captures the degrading behavior exhibited by these employees. It is vital that PearlBay management takes immediate and rigorous action to address this situation. We demand: 1. A thorough investigation into the conduct of Kapila employees. 2. A public apology issued to our family for the humiliation and distress caused. 3. Compulsory sensitivity training for all staff members. 4. Assurance that no visitor, irrespective of their situation, experiences such maltreatment. We await a swift response and appropriate resolution to this grievous matter. Failure to address this incident adequately will leave us with no choice but to escalate this concern further.

Had a really good experience, place maintained really well,specially wanna talk about the splash bay water park guest services team as they did a excellent job by giving us a outstanding service and also wanna mention about the thrill level of the slides, it was awesome! And target and arrowbay were also so fun . Thankyou pearlbay‚ù§Ô∏è

I visited on 05/08/2023 to Pearl Bag for the 1st time. TBH as they mentioned the park was open on time & ready to use for their customers. Not like other places. Here I really wanted to mention specifically about the Splash Bay (water area) staffs. Who were very welcoming, supportive & helpful from the time I entered, while I‚Äôm choosing the package & till we exit from there each & everyone was helpful & supportive. It‚Äôs really worth the price & really good place to experience the water games. Surely will be visiting again & again.

Had a really good experience,place maintained really well, specially wanna talk about the staff as they gave a wonderfull service because when I entered the Waterpark there was a high que on counters I thought it might take time because it was a Sunday  and it was full crowded, but I was wrong,because water park guest services members really gave a good explanation of the products and did my transaction quickly on cashier counters which I was eble to enter  inside the Waterpark quickly with my family after buying tickets, so it was a unbelievable experience, it was really fun and go karting was also amazing as it was my first time in a gokarting racing track, loved the targetbay  shooting too because even though it was real air rifles safety precautions and shooting techniques were explained well and I was able to shoot to the bullseye üéØ ,so wanna say , I will definitely come again!!‚ù§Ô∏è

Front office Supervisor (manager) and the few of the members of the team had very bad Attitude towards Customers and poor service needs to improve lot more than this if they are looking for more customers sad to say

Amazing experience Pearl bay was . My family and myself had the most exciting holidays at Pearl bay. Enjoyed all the rides . Very friendly customer service and clean environment . Hope that Pearl bay will always be maintained at the same levels . kudos to the mangement

Pearl Bay Water Park is a fun and enjoyable destination, but there are a few areas for improvement. One major issue is that the park doesn't offer free lockers, and instead has a dedicated person asking customers if we need them. This can be frustrating for customers, especially if they weren't aware of the additional cost beforehand. Additionally, the suggestion to change at your car and leave your belongings in there is not practical and can be inconvenient. Another issue is the park's ride policy, as they don't allow customers to ride alone(They asked two people which I didn't have üòï). It would be helpful if the park made this policy clear before customers purchase their tickets so they can plan accordingly. Despite these issues, Pearl Bay Water Park still offers a great range of attractions and facilities for those willing to pay for them. The park is well-maintained and staff are friendly and helpful. However, the management should consider the feedback of their customers and make improvements accordingly to ensure a better experience for everyone.
I love the "Great Escape", and the cleanliness of the facility, and the Speed bay.Every thing is worth the price, is you all the very best.
A well planned and well maintained water theme park. Highly recommend to have a fun day with friends. ‚ù§Ô∏è
One of the most beautiful places I have visited in Sri Lanka . Very nice to see a local company coming upto great heights in the industry . Overall fun place for everyone
International standards here locally! The guest services and entire facility was awesome! Oh and make sure to try the Great Escape (Gravity Drop)!

The experience at pearl bay was in another level , very friendly staff and the park is very clean . Hope the park will always be maintained at this level . My family had the most fun time . Recommended for everyone.

This is by far the best amusement park in sri lanka. Must go place in sri lanka.. All the water rides are amazing. And also staff is very friendly,Specially we should mention Mr Dimuthu and Mr Nimnath at the reception.

The water level at the kids play area with slides are too low, my son hurt his back when he came down the slide because he hit his tail bone at the bottom of the pool and was in allot of pain for 2 days.Parents kindly be vigilant as it could cause some serious damage to your children's spine.
A one of a kind experience. Love it a lot ! Ideal for the whole family. The family loved it a lot. 5 Stars!

We went as the second group to use this facility! Got there around 12:30 pm and left the place only after 6pm. If the kids had their way we would be still there! Highly impressed by the level of cleanliness and order. All equipment look modern. On arrival we were issued with wrist bands with QR codes that opened the entrance gate. Even the lockers were assigned to the QR code. Once inside you can access all the water riders as long as you like. A restaurant is also available for anyone wanting to dine inside. Wishing PearlbaySL all the best!
